price: 11. Ir palik Mane su neigiančiųjų (reikalais), (gyvenimo) patogumų turėtojais, ir leisk jiems truputį atsikvėpti.
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
